name: Better Wikipedia
description:
A fusion of 3 styles that I love (classypedia, clean wiki and  wikipedia clean white / links in the script). To create the perfect wikipedia style based on my requirements: sober, the content table is always there, it's easy to change the languages by putting your cursor to the left.

I hope you'll like it and send me some feedback if you try it :)
additional_info:
If you have other problem with styles compatibility let me know

Better Wikipedia 1.1
Fix compatibility problem with other styles modifing colors (mainly Dark Wikiedia https://userstyles.org/styles/42313/dark-wikipedia)
